title: So And So That | Grammar Exercise

questions.question: It was getting late, ………………… we decided to go home.
questions.description: We use 'so' to show the effect. We use 'so that' to show the purpose.

questions.question: The last bus had gone, ………………. we had to walk.
questions.description: We use 'so' to talk about the result or effect of the action or situation mentioned in the previous clause.

questions.question: The watch was very expensive, ..................... I didn’t buy it.
questions.description: We use 'so' to talk about the result or effect of the action or situation mentioned in the previous clause.

questions.question: The teacher spoke slowly …………………. the students could write down everything.
We sent the parcel a few days ago ..................... they should have received it by now.
I was tired ..................... . I took some rest.
The dialogues were ………………….., I couldn’t help laughing.
The sky was dark ……………… I took an umbrella with me.
